summary: A young girl who aspires to a singing career gets herself and her best friend a job as valet parking girls at a Malibu party in order to meet people who can help them achieve their dreams.
cast: Meri D. Marshall|April Stewart|Mary Kohnert|Jack DeLeon|Patricia Scott Michel|Jon Sharp|Michael Karm|Steven Lyon|Randy Vasquez|Stuart Fratkin|John Terlesky|Jean Byron|Charles Cooper|Kenny Sacha|Tony Cox|Richard Erdman|Rick Lieberman|Bridget Sienna|Matt Landers|Elizabeth Lamers|Elise Richards|Rebecca Cruz|Valerie Richards|Janette Caldwell|Kim Gillingham|Pinky|Victor Garron|Bob Parr|John Parr|Louis Molino|The Fibonaccis|Magie Song|Joe Berardi|John Dentino|Tom Corey|Barbara Dare|Ron Jeremy
title: Un parking muy especial
